discord_slash.model module¶

class discord_slash.model.SlashContext(_http: discord_slash.http.SlashCommandRequest, _json: dict, _discord: discord.ext.commands.bot.Bot)¶

Bases: object

Context of the slash command.

Kinda similar with discord.ext.commands.Context.

async send(send_type: int = 4, text: str = '', embeds: List[discord.embeds.Embed] = None, tts: bool = False)¶

Sends response of the slash command.

Parameters

  • send_type (int) – Type of the response. Refer Discord API DOCS for more info about types. Default 4.

  • text (str) – Text of the response. Can be None.

  • embeds (List[discord.Embed]) – Embeds of the response. Maximum 10, can be empty.

  • tts (bool) – Whether to speak message using tts. Default False.

Returns

None
